short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a small feature for hiding resolved threads in a GitLab merge requests and issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to hide resolved threads from merge requests and issues so they don't appear in the timeline at all.  This could help reduce the clutter in a merge request or issue and help you focus on the active issues.

It does so by hiding all the resolved threads by default and giving you a checkbox to show them.  The checkbox is located up by the "# unresolved threads" message for merge requests and at the top of the activity section for issues.

See the project page for more information: https://gitlab.com/someguy20336/gitlab-tools
